title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Kosatka Guided Missiles
content:
GTA+ Members can claim the Guided Missile upgrade for the Kosatka Submarine for free through October 11.

Obliterate your opposition with these remote-operated, manually controlled rockets that can be utilized against any target, including El Rubio's island forces during the Cayo Perico Heist.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
